tasks.label: Build Code
tasks.command: mkdir -p bin && clang++ -std=c++17 -g $(find src -type f -name '*.cpp') -w -o bin/main

tasks.label: Build Tests
tasks.command: mkdir -p bin && clang++ -std=c++17 -g -w $(find src -type f -name '*.cpp' ! -name 'main.cpp') $(find tests -type f -name '*.cpp') -o bin/tests -I/opt/homebrew/include -L/opt/homebrew/lib -lgtest -lgtest_main -lpthread
